data.name: Security, Identity, and Privacy Miniconf
data.description: Never has security been more in the news. Companies around the world know that they are going to have to prioritise identity and privacy within systems designs and processes, to ensure customers and clients are protected more than ever. While laws like the GDPR give us guidelines and recommendations…

relatedRecords.name: OWASP AppSec Day
relatedRecords.description: AppSec Day is Australia’s biggest software security conference aimed at Developers, DevOps Engineers, Quality Assurance Testers and Security Professionals alike.

relatedRecords.name: OWASP New Zealand Day - 2020
relatedRecords.description: We are proud to announce the eleventh OWASP New Zealand Day conference, to be held at the University of Auckland on Friday, February 21st, 2020. OWASP New Zealand Day is a one-day conference dedicated to information security, with an emphasis on secure architecture and development techniques to help…
